full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHRO BO SME BRTZEGS KYI SBYIN SREG 'GONG PO MTHAR BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B (ZHES KHRO BO SME BA BRTZEGS KYI SBYIN BSREG 'GOD PO MTHAR BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN GYIS MDZES PA'I GO SGRI SLOB DPON DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSE DBANG, PI SHI RIL THU THO YON DGE SLONG SHES RAB RDO RJE, NIG THA PI LIG THU TZU RA CHE DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG PO, MER KEN DA'I CHEN NANG SO DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG YON TAN SOGS KYIS SMAN RAM PA BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PA MDZAD PA'I SBYIN SREG GE CHO GA 'DI 'DON CHA RGYAS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^PAntI CHOS RJE'I MING CAN GYIS SBYIN BSREG CHO GA 'DI NYID GZHI @014A *, ,BYAS NAS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG GDON GYIS 'TSE BA'I 'GRO BA NYAM THAG PA RNAMS LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , BDAG DANG SBYIN BDAG 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA YI, LUS DAG YID GSUM SROG LUS DBANG THANG DANG, RLUNG RTA TSE BSOD DPAL 'BYOR SNYAN GRAGS DANG, RIGS RGYUD MI NOR RTA PHYUGS LONGS SBYOD KUN` `GNOD CING 'TSE BAR BYED PA'I 'GONG PO DANG, GSON 'DRE SHI 'DRE DKOR 'DRE RBAD 'DRE DANG, YUL 'DRE BYA 'DRE GONG 'DRE DANG, ,ZA 'DRE LHOG 'DRE SRID DANG DAM PA SRI DANG, ,PHUNG SRID DGRA SRI NA SRI GOD DAM 'DRE SRI DANG, BYIS PA'I CHUNG SRI LA SOGS GNOD 'TSE BYED, ,THAMS CAD DGRA BGEGS 'GONG PO M'A RA YA PHAt, ,
